Initializer# init(_:including:)

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
init<S>(
    _ container: AttributeContainer,
    including scope: KeyPath<AttributeScopes, S.Type>
) throws where S : AttributeScope
```

Available when `Key` is `NSAttributedString.Key` and `Value` is `Any`.## [See Also](/documentation/Swift/Dictionary/init(_:including:)-8ls7v#see-also)

### [Creating a Dictionary from an Attribute Container](/documentation/Swift/Dictionary/init(_:including:)-8ls7v#Creating-a-Dictionary-from-an-Attribute-Container)
